name: Polar Bear
description: A large, intelligent animal. Bears are omnivorous and are known to raid isolated homes and camps in the wilderness in search of food, although they often shy from contact with people. The polar bear inhabits the cold lands of the north, where great plains of ice and snow stretch as far as the eye can see.

0.name: Bite
0.description: The bear bites the target with its powerful jaws.

1.name: Swipe
1.description: The bear rakes the target with its claws. When a Swipe hits a target that is smaller than the bear, it must take a DC8 Athletics check to remain upright or else be forced prone.
